item.title: 早盘竞价：美联储、融资和就业迎接 11 月
item.description:
A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan翻译:迈克·多兰 (Mike Dolan) 对美国和全球市场未来一天的展望

Investors wishing to put a dark October behind them first need to negotiate Wednesday's Fed policy decision, Treasury's debt sale plans and the beginnings of a slew of labor market updates.翻译:希望将黑暗的十月抛在身后的投资者首先需要就周三的美联储政策决定、 财政部的债务出售计划以及一系列劳动力市场更新的开始进行谈判。

As world markets kick off a new month in better spirits that they were for most of the last one, overseas drama centred on Japan's yen - which plummeted close to last year's three-decade low of 151.94 on Tuesday after the Bank of Japan made only a minor tweak to its yield control policy.翻译:随着世界市场以比上个月大部分时间更好的状态开始新的一个月，海外戏剧性的焦点集中在日元上——周二，在日本央行仅做出了 151.94 美元的汇率后，日元暴跌至接近去年三年来的低点 151.94。对其收益率控制政策进行小幅调整。

Masato Kanda, Japan's top currency diplomat, protested the move on Wednesday, saying authorities were on "standby" to respond to the currency's "one-sided, sharp" slide - ramping up the rhetoric around yen-buying intervention. But that lifted the currency only slightly and it hovers about 151.27 first thing.翻译:日本首席货币外交官神田正人(Masato Kanda)周三对此举提出抗议，称当局已“待命”，以应对日元“单方面、急剧”下滑，加剧了围绕日元购买干预的言论。但这仅略微提振了该货币，并首先徘徊在 151.27 左右。

The problem is the BOJ may have loosened its 10-year bond buying target rate of 1% - but it's still committed to capping yields around there and did so yet again on Wednesday in another emergency operation that dragged yields back to 0.95%.翻译:问题是日本央行可能已经放松了 1% 的 10 年期债券购买目标利率，但它仍然致力于限制收益率，并在周三的另一次紧急操作中再次这样做，将收益率拖回 0.95%。

The weak yen and yield cap cheered Japan's Nikkei (.N225) stock index, which surged more than 2% earlier - helped by news of a more than doubling of Toyota's profits that lifted the auto giant's shares (7203.T) almost 5%.翻译:日元疲软和收益率上限提振了日本日经指数(.N225) ，该指数早些时候飙升逾 2%，这得益于丰田利润翻倍多的消息，这使得这家汽车巨头的股价(7203.T)上涨了近 5%。

Does the yen drama matter for U.S. markets? At the margin at least, the concern is that protracted yen intervention and dollar sales by Japan may also cut its demand for U.S. Treasuries at a sensitive time - while higher yields there drag Japanese bond investors back home.翻译:日元戏剧性事件对美国市场重要吗？至少在某种程度上，人们担心，日本长期干预日元和抛售美元也可能会在敏感时期削减其对美国国债的需求，而美国国债收益率上升则拖累日本债券投资者回国。

Despite the U.S. Treasury forecasting a lower fourth-quarter borrowing need than previously flagged, the tension in the bond market remains ahead of its detailed future refinancing plans due later on Wednesday. Key will be the amount of this year's whopping $1.6 trillion of bill sales it will have to roll into longer-term debt securities through 2024.翻译:尽管美国财政部预测第四季度借款需求将低于此前的预期，但在周三晚些时候公布详细的未来再融资计划之前，债券市场的紧张局势仍然存在。关键在于今年高达 1.6 万亿美元的票据销售金额必须在 2024 年之前转入长期债务证券。

With the Federal Reserve widely expected to hold policy rates steady again on Wednesday, the Treasury plans may end up getting more bond market attention. Ten-year yields nudged back higher to 4.89% overnight ahead of the two events.翻译:由于普遍预计美联储将在周三再次维持政策利率稳定，财政部计划最终可能会引起债券市场更多关注。在这两个事件发生之前，十年期国债收益率隔夜回升至 4.89%。

Fed officials will cast a wary eye over data released on Tuesday showing employment cost inflation picking up during the last quarter alongside accelerating house price rises in September.翻译:美联储官员将对周二公布的数据保持警惕，该数据显示上个季度就业成本通胀上升，同时 9 月份房价加速上涨。

But U.S. consumer confidence has softened, oil prices are falling again and the overseas demand picture is weakening.翻译:但美国消费者信心已经疲软，油价再次下跌，海外需求形势正在减弱。

Despite all the handwringing about the impact on energy prices from the Middle East conflict, U.S. crude prices fell to their lowest since August on Tuesday - to just above $80 per barrel and clocking year-on-year declines of some 7% that are the deepest since August too.翻译:尽管中东冲突对能源价格的影响令人担忧，但美国原油价格周二跌至 8 月以来的最低水平，略高于每桶 80 美元，同比跌幅约为 7%，创历史新高。也是从八月份开始。

With euro zone GDP numbers showing a contraction of the bloc's economy in the third quarter - in stark contrast to the boom in the United States - China's economy again showed signs of faltering on Wednesday.翻译:欧元区GDP数据显示第三季度该集团经济出现收缩——与美国的繁荣形成鲜明对比——周三中国经济再次显示出步履蹒跚的迹象。

Chinese factory activity unexpectedly contracted in October, a private survey showed on Wednesday, adding to a downbeat official manufacturing purchasing managers' index on Tuesday.翻译:周三的一项私人调查显示， 中国十月份工厂活动意外收缩，进一步加剧了周二悲观的官方制造业采购经理人指数。

The property bust smoulders, meantime. China Evergrande (3333.HK) proposed a new debt restructuring plan for offshore bondholders, offering to swap debts into 30% equity stakes in each of the developer's two Hong Kong-listed subsidiaries.翻译:与此同时，房地产泡沫破裂。 中国恒大（3333.HK）向境外债券持有人提出新的债务重组计划，提出将债务置换为该开发商两家香港上市子公司各30%的股权。

The gloom was only partly offset by hopes for an easing of political tensions as the White House confirmed President Joe Biden and his Chinese counterpart, Xi Jinping, now aim for a "constructive conversation" on the sidelines of the Asia Pacific Economic Cooperation forum in San Francisco this month.翻译:白宫证实，美国总统乔·拜登和中国国家主席习近平现在的目标是在旧金山举行的亚太经济合作论坛期间进行“建设性对话”，因此政治紧张局势缓和的希望仅部分抵消了这种阴郁情绪。弗朗西斯科这个月。

Beyond Tokyo, stocks elsewhere were more mixed and Wall Street futures pulled back slightly after the S&P500 (.SPX) recorded its first consecutive daily gains in three weeks. The new month saw a big retreat in the Vix (.VIX) volatility gauge to below 18.翻译:除东京以外，其他地方的股市涨跌互现，在标准普尔 500 指数(.SPX)录得三周来首次连续每日上涨后，华尔街期货小幅回落。新的一个月，Vix (.VIX)波动率指标大幅回落至 18 以下。

Another heavy day of U.S. corporate earnings is topped by big insurers and the likes of PayPal and Kraft Heinz.翻译:美国企业财报又迎来了沉重的一天，其中大型保险公司以及贝宝（PayPal）和卡夫亨氏（Kraft Heinz）等公司的业绩表现最为出色。

On Tuesday, shares in heavy-machinery maker Caterpillar (CAT.N) sank almost 7% as signs of slowing demand overshadowed a quarterly earnings beat. But Pinterest (PINS.N) shares surged almost 20% after the image-sharing platform beat estimates.翻译:周二，重型机械制造商卡特彼勒(CAT.N)的股价下跌近 7%，原因是需求放缓的迹象盖过了季度盈利的增长。但在图像共享平台Pinterest (PINS.N)超出预期后，其股价飙升近 20%。

Key developments that should provide more direction to U.S. markets later on Wednesday:翻译:周三晚些时候将为美国市场提供更多方向的关键事态发展：

* Federal Reserve policy decision and press conference翻译:* 美联储政策决定及新闻发布会

* U.S. Treasury quarterly refunding details翻译:* 美国财政部季度退款详情

* U.S. Oct ADP private sector payrolls, Sept JOLTS job openings data, ISM and S&P Global Oct manufacturing surveys翻译:* 美国 10 月 ADP 私营部门就业数据、9 月 JOLTS 职位空缺数据、ISM 和标普全球 10 月制造业调查

* U.S. corporate earnings: PayPal, Edison, AIG, Prudential Financial, MetLife, Qualcomm, Mckesson, Airbnb, Estee Lauder, Kraft Heinz, Marathon, Allstate, Congnizant Technology, Ingersoll Rand, Boston Properties, American Water Works, ETSY, ANSYS, Albermarle, Garmin, CVS, IDEXX, Yum! Brands, Humana, etc翻译:* 美国企业盈利：PayPal、Edison、AIG、Prudential Financial、MetLife、Qualcomm、Mckesson、Airbnb、雅诗兰黛、卡夫亨氏、马拉松、好事达、Congnizant Technology、英格索兰、Boston Properties、American Water Works、ETSY、ANSYS、Albermarle 、Garmin、CVS、IDEXX、百胜！品牌、Humana 等

item.title: 官方升级干预警告后日元从一年低点上涨
item.description:
The battered yen recovered some ground on Wednesday on threats of intervention from Japanese authorities, and as investors shifted focus to the Federal Reserve's policy decision later in the day.翻译:由于日本当局威胁进行干预，以及投资者将注意力转向当天晚些时候的美联储政策决定，遭受重创的日元周三收复部分失地。

The dollar was last down 0.33% at 151.24 yen , after more pointed-than-normal remarks from Japan's top currency diplomat Masato Kanda.翻译:日本首席货币外交官神田正人(Masato Kanda)发表了比平时更为尖锐的言论后，美元兑日元汇率最后下跌0.33%，至151.24日元。

It hit a one-year high on Tuesday as the yen slid after the Bank of Japan redefined its 1% limit on 10-year government bond yields as a reference rate rather than a hard cap.翻译:周二，日本央行将 10 年期政府债券收益率1% 的上限重新定义为参考利率而非硬上限，导致日元下跌，日元汇率触及一年高位。

The tweak underwhelmed many investors who had been expecting a stronger move away from ultra-loose monetary policy.翻译:这一调整让许多投资者感到失望，他们原本期望采取更强有力的措施摆脱超宽松的货币政策。

It was not enough to close the wide gap in bond yields between Japan and other countries, that has been responsible for the yen's almost 14% drop against the dollar this year.翻译:这还不足以缩小日本与其他国家之间债券收益率的巨大差距，而这一差距是今年日元兑美元汇率下跌近14%的原因。

"It's still the case that interest rate differentials are widening significantly in favour of the U.S," said Claudio Irigoyen, global head of economics at Bank of America Global Research.翻译:美国银行全球研究部全球经济主管克劳迪奥·伊里戈延（Claudio Irigoyen）表示：“利差仍然在显着扩大，对美国有利。”

"So the normalisation... is relatively fast for BOJ standards, but slow relative to what we are seeing in the rest of the world."翻译:“因此，正常化......对于日本央行的标准来说相对较快，但相对于我们在世界其他地区看到的情况来说却较慢。”

The yen traded weaker than 160 per euro for the first time since 2008 on Tuesday, but recovered slightly to 159.68 on Wednesday.翻译:周二，日元兑欧元汇率自 2008 年以来首次跌破 160 欧元，但周三小幅回升至 159.68。

"The market definitely will try to probe for where the red line is for the Ministry of Finance," said Alvin Tan, head of Asia FX strategy at RBC Capital Markets.翻译:加拿大皇家银行资本市场 (RBC Capital Markets) 亚洲外汇策略主管阿尔文·谭 (Alvin Tan) 表示：“市场肯定会尝试探索财政部的红线在哪里。”

"It's clear that it's not at 150 (per dollar)… but you don't want to be out there in front when the Japanese authorities intervene."翻译:“很明显，它不是 150（每美元）……但当日本当局干预时，你不想站在前面。”

Trading elsewhere in currency markets was subdued. The U.S. dollar index , which tracks the greenback against its major peers, inched 0.11% higher to 106.78.翻译:货币市场其他地方的交易低迷。追踪美元兑主要货币的美元指数小幅上涨 0.11%，至 106.78。

Economists expect the Fed to keep interest rates on hold when it announces its decision at 1800 GMT (2 p.m. ET).翻译:经济学家预计美联储将在格林尼治标准时间 1800 点（东部时间下午 2 点）宣布决定时维持利率不变。

Investors will scrutinise Chair Jerome Powell's comments for hints about how long rates will stay at the current 5.25% to 5.5% level and whether there's a chance of them rising again.翻译:投资者将密切关注主席杰罗姆·鲍威尔 (Jerome Powell) 的言论，以获取有关利率将在当前 5.25% 至 5.5% 水平维持多久以及利率是否有再次上升机会的暗示。

The dollar index has traded sideways since hitting an almost one-year high of 107.34 in early October on the back of a sharp rise U.S. bond yields driven by strong economic growth.翻译:在经济强劲增长带动美债收益率大幅上升的背景下，美元指数自10月初触及近一年高点107.34以来一直横盘整理。

Analysts said a potentially bigger event for bond and currency markets on Wednesday is the U.S. Treasury's announcement at 1230 GMT (8.30 a.m. ET) of how it intends to fund its wide budget deficits via the bond market.翻译:分析师表示，周三债券和货币市场可能面临的更大事件是美国财政部于格林尼治标准时间 1230 点（东部时间上午 8 点 30 分）宣布打算如何通过债券市场为其庞大的预算赤字融资。

The euro fell 0.17% to $1.0558 in the wake of Tuesday's fall in growth and inflation.翻译:继周二经济增长和通胀下滑之后，欧元下跌 0.17% 至 1.0558 美元。

"The data shows the (European Central Bank's) 450 basis points of interest rate hikes ... are working to restrict demand," said CBA analyst Carol Kong. "We estimate the euro zone economy is now in recession."翻译:CBA分析师Carol Kong表示：“数据显示（欧洲央行）加息450个基点……正在努力限制需求。” “我们估计欧元区经济目前正处于衰退之中。”

Sterling was down less than 0.1% at $1.2149 ahead of the Bank of England's interest rate decision on Thursday.翻译:在英国央行周四做出利率决定之前，英镑下跌不到 0.1%，至 1.2149 美元。

The Australian dollar rose 0.13% to $0.6345.翻译:澳元兑美元上涨0.13%至0.6345美元。

Factory activity indicators in China, Japan and South Korea showed activity slowed in October.翻译:中国、日本和韩国的工厂活动指标显示 10 月份活动放缓。

Reporting by Tom Westbrook in Singapore and Harry Robertson in London; Editing by Edwina Gibbs and Varun H K翻译:汤姆·威斯布鲁克 (Tom Westbrook) 在新加坡和哈里·罗伯逊 (Harry Robertson) 在伦敦的报道；编辑：Edwina Gibbs 和 Varun HK

item.title: 美联储干预日元之前股市小幅走高
item.description:
Summary:
  • Yen strengthens but still close to 1-yr low vs dollar翻译:日元走强，但兑美元仍接近一年低点
  • Asia's factories squeezed in Oct翻译:10月份亚洲工厂受到挤压
  • Spotlight now on Fed, Powell speech翻译:现在聚焦美联储、鲍威尔讲话
  • Morning Bid Europe - Yen hangs under intervention cloud翻译:欧洲早盘竞价 - 日元在干预阴云下徘徊

Subdued stocks inched higher on Wednesday ahead of a policy decision from the Federal Reserve later in the day, while the yen was stuck near one-year lows against the dollar as Tokyo ramped up intervention warnings.翻译:在美联储当天晚些时候做出政策决定之前，周三低迷的股市小幅走高，而随着东京加大干预警告力度，日元兑美元汇率徘徊在一年低点附近。

Europe's benchmark STOXX index rose 0.46%, more positive than the 0.1% gain in MSCI's broadest index of Asia-Pacific shares outside Japan (.MIAPJ0000PUS) which has clocked three straight months of losses.翻译:欧洲基准 STOXX 指数上涨 0.46%，高于 MSCI 日本以外最广泛的亚太股票指数(.MIAPJ0000PUS) 0.1% 的涨幅，该指数已连续三个月下跌。

Japan's Nikkei (.N225) was 2% higher as investors remained on red alert for yen-buying intervention from authorities to try to scrape the currency off the floor after recent central bank policy tweaks failed to reverse its recent losses.翻译:日本日经指数(.N225)上涨 2%，原因是投资者仍对当局买入日元的干预保持红色警惕，因为央行近期的政策调整未能扭转近期的跌势，试图将日元从底部拉下来。

The spotlight on Wednesday will meanwhile firmly be on the Federal Reserve's policy decision, with the central bank widely expected to hold rates steady.翻译:与此同时，周三的焦点将集中在美联储的政策决定上，普遍预计美联储将维持利率稳定。

Comments from Fed Chair Jerome Powell will be scrutinised to gauge where interest rates are headed and how long they will stay higher.翻译:美联储主席杰罗姆·鲍威尔的评论将受到仔细审查，以判断利率走向以及利率将保持在较高水平多久。

Erik Weisman, chief economist and portfolio manager at MFS Investment Management, said the Fed would keep the option of future rate hikes firmly on the table until the labour market cools considerably and inflationary pressures ease.翻译:MFS投资管理公司首席经济学家兼投资组合经理埃里克·韦斯曼表示，美联储将坚定地保留未来加息的选择，直到劳动力市场大幅降温和通胀压力缓解。

"Chairman Powell will also argue that the lagged effects of past hikes have not fully impacted the economy and that patience is prudent," Weisman said.翻译:韦斯曼表示：“鲍威尔主席还将辩称，过去加息的滞后效应并未完全影响经济，保持耐心是谨慎的。”

Markets are pricing in a 29% chance of a 25 basis point hike in December and a 35% chance of a 25 bps hike in January, the CME FedWatch tool showed.翻译:CME FedWatch 工具显示，市场预计 12 月加息 25 个基点的可能性为 29%，1 月加息 25 个基点的可能性为 35%。

U.S. stocks looked set for a shakier start on Wednesday, with S&P e-mini futures, NASDAQ futures and DOW futures all down around 0.21%. , ,翻译:周三美国股市开局似乎较为不稳定，标准普尔电子迷你期货、纳斯达克期货和道指期货均下跌约 0.21%。 , ,

Treasury yields remained elevated, with the yield on 10-year Treasury notes up 4 basis points to 4.914%. The yield on the 30-year Treasury bond was up 5.3 basis points to 5.077%.翻译:美国国债收益率保持高位，其中10年期国债收益率上涨4个基点至4.914%。 30年期国债收益率上涨5.3个基点至5.077%。

The two-year U.S. Treasury yield, which typically moves in step with interest rate expectations, was up 0.8 basis points at 5.079%.翻译:通常与利率预期一致的两年期美国国债收益率上涨0.8个基点至5.079%。

Claudio Irigoyen, global head of economics at BofA Global Research, said the most important question for the next three to five years in the discussion about U.S. fiscal policy is whether interest rates will go back to pre-pandemic levels.翻译:美国银行全球研究部全球经济主管克劳迪奥·伊里戈延表示，未来三到五年在有关美国财政政策的讨论中最重要的问题是利率是否会回到疫情前的水平。

"Or if this is a new regime of higher real interest rates," Irigoyen said. "And I think that I am more on the camp of the second option."翻译:“或者如果这是一个更高实际利率的新制度，”伊里戈延说。 “而且我认为我更倾向于第二种选择。”

YEN VIGIL

Market focus in Asia was firmly on the yen in the wake of the Bank of Japan's decision to tweak its bond yield control policy again on Tuesday, further loosening its grip on long-term interest rates.翻译:日本央行周二决定再次调整债券收益率控制政策，进一步放松对长期利率的控制，亚洲市场焦点牢牢锁定在日元上。

The move drove a broad slide in the yen on Tuesday, sending it tumbling to a one-year low against the dollar and touching a 15-year low against the euro as investors had expected a bigger BOJ step towards ending years of massive monetary stimulus.翻译:此举导致日元周二大幅下跌，兑美元跌至一年低点，兑欧元触及15年低点，因为投资者原本预计日本央行将采取更大措施结束多年来的大规模货币刺激措施。

"The market has seen the tweak to a flexible regime as clear dovish development," said Chris Weston, head of research at Pepperstone.翻译:Pepperstone 研究主管克里斯·韦斯顿 (Chris Weston) 表示：“市场已将灵活制度的调整视为明显的鸽派发展。”

"Once again market players have been left frustrated by the lack of urgency shown by the BOJ, and either closed yen longs or flipped into outright yen shorts."翻译:“市场参与者再次对日本央行缺乏紧迫感感到沮丧，要么平仓日元多头，要么直接转为日元空头。”

The sharp drop in the yen prompted a fresh and sterner warning from Japan's top currency diplomat Masato Kanda that authorities were on standby to respond to recent "one-sided, sharp" moves in the currency.翻译:日元大幅贬值促使日本首席货币外交官神田正人发出新的、更严厉的警告，称当局已做好准备应对近期日元“单方面、急剧”的走势。

The yen strengthened 0.24% to 151.31 per dollar following the comments but remained close to one-year lows of 151.74 it hit on Tuesday and the three-decade low of 151.94 touched last year, which triggered an intervention by Tokyo at the time.翻译:此番言论发表后，日元兑美元汇率上涨0.24%至151.31，但仍接​​近周二触及的一年低点151.74，以及去年触及的十年低点151.94，这引发了东京当时的干预。

Against a basket of currencies, the dollar was up 0.12% at 106.79. Sterling was last at $1.2151, down 0.2% on the day.翻译:美元兑一篮子货币上涨0.12%至106.79。英镑最新报1.2151美元，当日下跌0.2%。

Data on Wednesday showed Asia's manufacturers faced worsening pressure in October with factory activity in China slipping back into decline, clouding recovery prospects for the region's major exporters already squeezed by weaker global demand and higher prices.翻译:周三的数据显示，亚洲制造商10月份面临着日益恶化的压力，中国的工厂活动重新陷入衰退，给已经受到全球需求疲软和价格上涨挤压的该地区主要出口商的复苏前景蒙上阴影。翻译:十月份，亚洲制造商面临着日益恶化的压力，中国的工厂活动重新陷入衰退，给已经受到全球需求疲软和价格上涨挤压的该地区主要出口商的复苏前景蒙上阴影。

Oil prices rose ahead of the Fed decision, with the market keeping a close eye on the latest developments in the Israel-Hamas conflict, as geopolitical risks offset record production levels in the U.S.翻译:美联储决定前油价上涨，市场密切关注以色列与哈马斯冲突的最新进展，因地缘政治风险抵消了美国创纪录的产量水平

U.S. crude rose 0.43% to $81.45 per barrel and Brent was at $85.55, up 0.62% on the day.翻译:美国原油上涨0.43%至每桶81.45美元，布伦特原油上涨0.62%至85.55美元。

item.title: 北京雾霾笼罩华北部分地区
item.description:
Hazy weather hung over Beijing on Wednesday with conditions in other parts of north China possibly worsening, forecasters said, although cold air sweeping in from the northwest is expected to help dissipate the smog.翻译:预报员表示，周三北京上空出现雾霾天气，华北其他地区的情况可能会恶化，但预计从西北吹来的冷空气将有助于驱散雾霾。

Experts attributed the haze in Beijing, which has lasted for several days, to poor atmospheric diffusion because of unseasonably weak cold air currents from the north.翻译:专家将北京持续多日的雾霾归因于来自北方的冷气流反常微弱，导致大气扩散不良。

Visibility in most parts of Beijing dropped to less than 500 metres (546 yards), the China Meteorological Administration said.翻译:中国气象局表示，北京大部分地区的能见度降至不足 500 米（546 码）。

"I didn't expect the smog to be so bad these days. The masks I've brought are almost used up," said a 24-year-old Beijing tourist surnamed Gao.翻译:“没想到这几天雾霾这么严重，我带的口罩都快用完了。”24岁的北京游客高姓游客说。

In some places, heavy winter fog was adding to the murky conditions and visibility was less than 50 metres in parts of Hebei province and Tianjin city.翻译:部分地区冬季大雾天气，河北省、天津市部分地区能见度不足50米。

Moderate to heavy air pollution was expected in the Beijing-Tianjin-Hebei area and surrounding cities until Thursday, with short bouts of severe conditions, the environment ministry said after a meeting of its agencies.翻译:环保部在召开部属部门会议后表示，预计截至周四，京津冀地区及周边城市将出现中度至重度空气污染，并伴有短暂的严重天气。

While the north of the region will improve in the first half of this month, pollution may persist in southern areas, it said.翻译:报告称，虽然该地区的北部地区将在本月上半月有所改善，但南部地区的污染可能持续存在。

"The overall environment is getting better these years but in recent days the smog has come back. We're not sure what's exactly causing it," said an 82-year-old Beijing resident surnamed Liu.翻译:“这些年整体环境在好转，但最近几天雾霾又回来了，不知道到底是什么原因造成的。”82岁的北京刘姓居民说。

Temperatures were unusually similar to early summer, with some places recording 10 degrees Celsius above normal and likely to persist until Thursday, forecasters said, adding that records are likely to be broken in big cities such as Jinan, Zhengzhou and Shijiazhuang.翻译:预报员表示，气温与初夏异常相似，一些地方的气温比正常水平高出10摄氏度，并可能持续到周四，并补充说，济南、郑州和石家庄等大城市的气温记录可能会被打破。

Beijing's observatory in the last ten days of October recorded an average temperature for 3.4 degree Celsius higher than normal, breaking records for the same period since 1961, local media said.翻译:据当地媒体报道，北京气象台10月最后10天的平均气温较常年偏高3.4摄氏度，打破了1961年以来的同期记录。

The average temperature for the month was second highest in 62 years, after 2006's record.翻译:该月平均气温创 62 年来第二高，仅次于 2006 年的记录。

But from Thursday night, cold air is expected to push temperatures lower, possibly to new lows.翻译:但从周四晚上开始，冷空气预计将导致气温下降，甚至可能创下新低。

Reporting by Liz Lee, Ethan Wang and Xiaoyu Yin; Editing by Robert Birsel and Sonali Paul翻译:Liz Lee、Ethan Wang、Xiaoyu Yin 报道；罗伯特·伯塞尔和索纳利·保罗编辑

item.title: 中国资深气候特使谢将于12月下台-政府消息人士
item.description:
China's veteran climate change envoy, Xie Zhenhua, is set to retire in December at the end of this year's COP28 climate talks in Dubai, a government official familiar with the situation confirmed on Wednesday.翻译:一位熟悉情况的政府官员周三证实，中国资深气候变化特使解振华将于今年 12 月在迪拜举行的 COP28 气候谈判结束时退休。

Xie, who turns 74 this month, will be replaced by Liu Zhenmin, a former Chinese vice-foreign minister and United Nations Under-Secretary General, according to the official, who declined to be named because he was not authorised to speak to the media.翻译:这位官员表示，本月将满 74 岁的谢霆锋将由前中国外交部副部长兼联合国副秘书长刘振民接替。该官员拒绝透露姓名，因为他无权向媒体发表讲话。

Born in Tianjin in 1949, Xie served as China's top environmental official from 1999 to 2005, when he was forced to step down after a catastrophic benzine explosion left 5 million people without water supplies.翻译:谢先生1949年出生于天津，1999年至2005年期间担任中国最高环保官员，在一次灾难性的汽油爆炸导致500万人断水后被迫下台。

He first represented China in global climate negotiations in 2007 after his appointment as vice-chairman of the National Development and Reform Commission, the country's state planning agency. He led China's delegation during ill-fated and sometimes ill-tempered climate negotiations in Copenhagen in December 2009.翻译:2007年，他被任命为国家发展和改革委员会副主任，首次代表中国参加全球气候谈判。 2009年12月，他率领中国代表团参加了在哥本哈根举行的命运多舛、有时甚至脾气暴躁的气候谈判。

Experts say his friendly relationship with U.S. counterpart Todd Stern was vital in achieving consensus between the world's top two greenhouse gas emitters and helped get the landmark 2015 Paris Agreement over the line.翻译:专家表示，他与美国同行托德·斯特恩的友好关系对于全球最大的两个温室气体排放国之间达成共识至关重要，并帮助达成具有里程碑意义的2015年《巴黎协定》。

"The role of individuals matters a great deal in climate diplomacy," said Li Shuo, senior adviser at Greenpeace in Beijing.翻译:“个人的作用在气候外交中非常重要，”北京绿色和平组织高级顾问李硕说。

"Over his long tenure as China's chief negotiator, Xie has demonstrated that it is possible to bridge the differences between China and the West," he added.翻译:他补充说：“在担任中国首席谈判代表的长期任期中，谢已经证明弥合中国与西方之间的分歧是可能的。”

Climate talks between Washington and Beijing broke down during the presidency of Donald Trump, and Xie quit as envoy a year later. He remained involved in building climate ties with the United States, helping set up the California-China Climate Institute with then governor Jerry Brown.翻译:华盛顿和北京之间的气候谈判在唐纳德·特朗普担任总统期间破裂，一年后，谢辞去特使职务。他仍然致力于与美国建立气候关系，与时任州长杰里·布朗一起帮助建立了加州-中国气候研究所。

He returned as special envoy in 2021 after the election of President Joe Biden brought the United States back into the Paris Agreement, but his friendship with Stern's replacement, John Kerry, has not been enough to overcome rising geopolitical tensions between the countries.翻译:2021年，乔·拜登总统当选，美国重新加入《巴黎协定》后，他以特使身份回归，但他与斯特恩继任者约翰·克里的友谊并不足以克服两国之间日益加剧的地缘政治紧张局势。

China has repeatedly told the United States that climate change is not a diplomatic "oasis" that could be separated from broader disputes between the two sides, including U.S. tariffs and sanctions on Chinese-produced solar panels.翻译:中国一再告诉美国，气候变化不是一个外交“绿洲” ，不能与两国之间更广泛的争端分开，包括美国对中国生产的太阳能电池板征收关税和制裁。

Formal talks resumed between Xie and Kerry in Beijing in July this year and the two are set to meet again this week ahead of an APEC summit in San Francisco.翻译:谢和克里于今年7月在北京恢复了正式会谈，两人定于本周在旧金山举行的亚太经合组织峰会之前再次会面。

Reporting by Muyu Xu and David Stanway in Singapore, Editing by William Maclean翻译:徐木宇和大卫·斯坦威驻新加坡报道，威廉·麦克林编辑

item.title: 中国公司推出股指以迎合避险黄金热潮
item.description:
China's biggest index provider launched on Wednesday two gold-linked stock indices to cash in on surging demand for exposure to the safe-haven metal amid a slump in the local real estate market and volatile global markets.翻译:中国最大的指数提供商周三推出了两个与黄金挂钩的股票指数，以利用在当地房地产市场低迷和全球市场动荡之际对避险金属的需求激增。

The new indexes (.CSI931493), (.CSI931413), launched by the China Securities Index Co, include shares of global gold miners such as Newmont Corporation (NEM.N) and Barrick Gold .翻译:中证指数公司推出的新指数（.CSI931493） 、 （.CSI931413）包括纽蒙特公司（NEM.N）和巴里克黄金等全球黄金矿商的股票。

"The indexes offer a new method beyond traditional strategies," the government-backed index company said in a statement. "It provides the market with more tools to invest in the gold business, and can help households better manage their wealth."翻译:这家政府支持的指数公司在一份声明中表示：“这些指数提供了一种超越传统策略的新方法。” “它为市场提供了更多投资黄金业务的工具，并可以帮助家庭更好地管理财富。”

Spot gold has gained more than 8% so far this year, rising to an almost six-month high of $2,009 an ounce last week. In yuan terms , it is up more than 15% for the year so far.翻译:今年迄今为止，现货黄金已上涨超过 8%，上周升至近六个月高点 2,009 美元/盎司。以人民币计算，今年迄今已上涨超过 15%。

Miners, which typically pay dividends, have also seen their shares rise, with an index tracking China-listed gold miners (.CSI930619) up nearly 15%, compared with an 8% drop in the benchmark CSI300 Index (.CSI300) so far this year.翻译:通常派发股息的矿业股的股价也有所上涨，追踪中国上市黄金矿业股的指数(.CSI930619)上涨近 15%，而基准沪深 300 指数(.CSI300)迄今为止已下跌 8%。年。

"Gold is the brightest asset at the moment... promising much better returns than Chinese property or the broad stock market," said Shihua Duan, general manager of Shanghai Changer Invest.翻译:上海长尔投资总经理段世华表示：“黄金是目前最亮眼的资产……其回报率比中国房地产或大盘股市要高得多。”

"Gold shines as a safe haven against the backdrop of the Ukraine war, economic woes and the Middle East conflict."翻译:“在乌克兰战争、经济困境和中东冲突的背景下，黄金作为避风港闪闪发光。”

The indices follow the launch of other Chinese gold-related investment products that offer exposure in a country where gold consumption in the first three quarters of 2023 climbed 7.32%.翻译:该指数是在中国推出其他与黄金相关的投资产品之后推出的，这些产品提供了中国2023年前三季度黄金消费量增长7.32%的投资机会。

China Asset Management Co and Maxwealth Fund Management Co last month launched China's first exchange-traded funds (ETFs) (517520.SS) that invest in gold stocks. Another seven mutual fund companies have applied to launch similar products.翻译:华夏基金和永赢基金管理公司上个月推出了中国首只投资黄金股的交易所交易基金（ETF） （517520.SS） 。另有七家共同基金公司已申请推出类似产品。

"Buying the gold bar is the safest among so many investment choices," said gold investor Jack Liu, who spent 230,000 yuan ($31,425) on a gold bar in September.翻译:“在众多投资选择中，购买金条是最安全的，”黄金投资者 Jack Liu 说道，他在 9 月份花费了 23 万元人民币（合 31,425 美元）购买了一根金条。

($1 = 7.3190 Chinese yuan renminbi)翻译:（1 美元 = 7.3190 人民币）

item.title: 白宫计划于 11 月在旧金山举行拜登与习近平会晤
item.description:
Teams for U.S. President Joe Biden and Chinese President Xi Jinping have an agreement in principle for them to meet in San Francisco in November but important details need to be hammered out, a senior Biden administration official said on Tuesday.翻译:拜登政府一位高级官员周二表示，美国总统乔·拜登和中国国家主席习近平的团队已原则上达成协议，将于 11 月在旧金山会面，但重要细节需要敲定。

The official amplified on remarks by White House press secretary Karine Jean-Pierre at her daily press briefing, where she said the two leaders are aiming to have a "constructive conversation" on the sidelines of the Asia Pacific Economic Cooperation forum in San Francisco.翻译:这位官员详细阐述了白宫新闻秘书卡琳·让-皮埃尔在每日新闻发布会上的讲话，她表示两国领导人计划在旧金山亚太经济合作论坛期间进行“建设性对话”。

"There is an agreement in principle to meet in San Francisco in November. We are still working through important details needed to finalize those plans," the official said.翻译:这位官员表示：“原则上已达成协议，将于 11 月在旧金山举行会议。我们仍在研究敲定这些计划所需的重要细节。”

Biden, his national security adviser Jake Sullivan and Secretary of State Antony Blinken discussed the prospect for a Biden-Xi summit in talks with Chinese foreign minister Wang Yi at the White House and at the State Department on Friday.翻译:拜登、他的国家安全顾问杰克·沙利文和国务卿安东尼·布林肯周五在白宫和国务院与中国外交部长王毅会谈时讨论了拜登与习近平峰会的前景。

The APEC summit is to take place in mid-November.翻译:APEC峰会将于11月中旬举行。

Reporting by Steve Holland, Jeff Mason and Costas Pitas; Editing by Eric Beech and Chizu Nomiyama翻译:史蒂夫·霍兰德、杰夫·梅森和科斯塔斯·皮塔斯报道；编辑：Eric Beech 和 Chizu Nomiyama

item.title: 中日海警在争议岛屿附近再次对峙
item.description:
Chinese and Japanese coast guard ships faced off in waters around disputed islands in the East China Sea again on Wednesday, with both countries saying they deployed patrol ships to urge the other side to leave the territory.翻译:周三，中国和日本海警船在东海争议岛屿附近海域再次对峙，两国均表示已部署巡逻船敦促对方离开该海域。

The disputed islands, called Diaoyu in China and Senkaku in Japan, are claimed by both countries.翻译:这些有争议的岛屿在中国称为钓鱼岛，在日本称为尖阁诸岛，两国都声称拥有主权。

The Chinese coast guard said three Japanese ships and several patrol ships illegally entered its territorial waters on Wednesday and that it took necessary control measures in accordance with the law.翻译:中国海警表示，三艘日本船只和几艘巡逻船周三非法进入中国领海，已依法采取必要管控措施。

Japan's coast guard said its patrol boats in turn repeatedly urged three Chinese coast guard vessels to leave the waters.翻译:日本海上保安厅表示，其巡逻艇又多次敦促三艘中国海警船离开该海域。

A similar incident occurred on Oct. 17.翻译:10月17日也发生过类似事件。

Reporting by Beijing newsroom, Mariko Katsumura in Tokyo; Editing by Jacqueline Wong and Chang-Ran Kim翻译:北京新闻编辑部胜村真理子驻东京报道；编辑：Jacqueline Wong 和 Chang-Ran Kim
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 万圣节狂欢者聚集在上海，一些人穿着被视为抗议中国政策的服装
item.description:
Halloween revellers thronged central Shanghai late on Tuesday night, with some dressed in costumes that poked fun at China's strict COVID-19 curbs in a rare showcase of free expression as police looked on.翻译:周二深夜，万圣节狂欢者聚集在上海市中心，一些人穿着戏服，在警察的注视下，罕见地表达了自由言论，取笑中国严格的 COVID-19 限制措施。

Celebrations in the Chinese financial hub began on the weekend, culminating on Tuesday in a large crowd of mostly young people that gathered around a popular bar area, according to onlookers and social media posts.翻译:据旁观者和社交媒体帖子称，中国金融中心的庆祝活动从周末开始，周二，一大群年轻人聚集在一个受欢迎的酒吧区，庆祝活动达到高潮。

While most attendees did not dress up and many of those who did wore outfits like monsters and superheros, some attracted attention on social media for costumes such as blue and white hazmat suits that gained infamy in China last year for being used by authorities enforcing COVID-19 curbs known as "dabai".翻译:虽然大多数与会者都没有盛装打扮，而且许多参加者都穿着怪物和超级英雄的服装，但一些人因蓝色和白色防护服等服装在社交媒体上引起了关注，去年，这些服装因被执法部门使用而在中国声名狼藉。 19条路边称为“大白”。

Almost a year ago Shanghai was the site of historic protests over China's stringent COVID restrictions that spread to several cities and which were later seen as a trigger for the country's sudden lifting of the policy in December last year.翻译:大约一年前，上海爆发了针对中国严格的新冠疫情限制措施的历史性抗议活动，抗议活动蔓延到多个城市，后来被视为中国去年 12 月突然取消该政策的触发因素。

Social media posts from Tuesday and the days before included one of a man donning boards illustrating China's slumping stock market and another dressed up as Lu Xun, a famous author whose works have been popular among Chinese youth as they grapple with historic rates of unemployment.翻译:周二和前几天的社交媒体帖子中，一名男子穿着展示中国股市暴跌的图板，另一名男子装扮成著名作家鲁迅，他的作品在中国年轻人中很受欢迎，因为他们正努力应对创纪录的失业率。

The man recited a work by the author that urged those "who can speak out to speak out", before he was told to leave by a police officer, the video showed. Reuters was unable to verify the authenticity of the video.翻译:视频显示，这名男子背诵了作者的一首作品，敦促那些“能说话的人大声说话”，然后警察让他离开。路透社无法核实该视频的真实性。

"The 'dabai', COVID-19 testing, A-share market...that Shanghai people dressed up as are all elements that speak to the trauma of the times and traces of history. Once again, entertainment is not superficial, behind it are real life scars," said one user on Weibo on Wednesday.翻译:“‘大白’、COVID-19检测、A股市场……上海人的装扮，都是诉说着时代创伤和历史痕迹的元素。再次强调，娱乐不是表面的，它的背后是现实生活中的伤疤，”一位用户周三在微博上说道。

Public critiques of government policies are rare in China, where authorities have been cracking down on free expression.翻译:在中国，对政府政策的公开批评很少见，因为当局一直在打压言论自由。

Some party goers also showed up with blank sheets of paper stuck to their clothes, a key symbol of last year's protests, other social media posts showed.翻译:其他社交媒体帖子显示，一些参加聚会的人的衣服上还贴着白纸，这是去年抗议活动的一个重要标志。

There was little sign of aggressive efforts to stop the gathering by police, but some people in costumes that could be perceived as subversive were filmed being escorted away.翻译:几乎没有迹象表明警方采取了积极措施阻止集会，但一些穿着可能被视为颠覆性服装的人被拍到被护送离开。

Reporting by Brenda Goh; Additional reporting by Casey Hall and Eduardo Baptista in Beijing; Editing by Michael Perry翻译:布伦达·吴报道； Casey Hall 和 Eduardo Baptista 在北京的补充报道；迈克尔·佩里编辑
item.author: Brenda Goh

item.title: 中国刚刚起步的复苏摇摇欲坠，亚洲工厂受到挤压
item.description:
Summary:
  • China's Oct private PMI marks first contraction since July翻译:中国10月私人PMI自7月以来首次收缩
  • Japan, South Korea continue to see factory activity slump翻译:日本、韩国工厂活动继续低迷
  • Surveys underscore Asia's fragile economic recovery翻译:调查凸显亚洲经济复苏脆弱

Asia's manufacturers faced worsening pressure in October with factory activity in China slipping back into decline, clouding recovery prospects for the region's major exporters already squeezed by weaker global demand and higher prices.翻译:十月份，亚洲制造商面临着日益恶化的压力，中国的工厂活动重新陷入衰退，给已经受到全球需求疲软和价格上涨挤压的该地区主要出口商的复苏前景蒙上阴影。

Purchasing managers' indexes (PMIs) for factory powerhouses China, Japan and South Korea showed activity shrinking while Vietnam and Malaysia also struggled with the broadening fallout from a Chinese slowdown.翻译:中国、日本和韩国等工厂强国的采购经理人指数（PMI）显示经济活动萎缩，而越南和马来西亚也面临着中国经济放缓扩大影响的困境。

China's Caixin/S&P Global manufacturing PMI fell to 49.5 in October from 50.6 in September, a private sector survey showed on Wednesday, falling back below the 50.0 point threshold that separates growth from contraction.翻译:周三的一项私营部门调查显示，中国财新/标普全球制造业 PMI 从 9 月的 50.6 降至 10 月的 49.5，回落至区分增长与收缩的 50.0 点以下。

The Chinese survey echoed a downbeat official PMI reading on Tuesday, which also showed an unexpected contraction in activity, casting doubt over recent hopes of a recovery in the world's second-largest economy.翻译:中国的调查与周二悲观的官方采购经理人指数相呼应，该数据也显示经济活动意外收缩，使人们对世界第二大经济体近期复苏的希望产生怀疑。

"Overall, manufacturers were not in high spirits in October," said Wang Zhe, an economist at Caixin Insight Group, on China's survey outcome.翻译:财新智库经济学家王哲在谈到中国​​的调查结果时表示，“总体而言，10月份制造商的情绪并不高涨。”

"The economy has showed signs of bottoming out, but the foundation of recovery is not solid. Demand is weak, many internal and external uncertainties remain, and expectations are still relatively weak."翻译:“经济已出现触底回升迹象，但复苏基础并不牢固，需求疲软，内外部诸多不确定因素依然存在，预期仍较弱。”

The impact of China's slowdown is being felt in countries like Japan and South Korea, whose manufacturers are heavily reliant on demand from the Asian giant.翻译:日本和韩国等国家也感受到了中国经济放缓的影响，这些国家的制造商严重依赖这个亚洲巨人的需求。

Japan's factory activity shrank for a fifth straight month in October, the final au Jibun Bank PMI showed.翻译:au Jibun 银行 PMI 终值显示，10 月份日本工厂活动连续第五个月萎缩。

That came a day after official figures showed Japan's factory output rose much less than expected in September as demand slowed significantly.翻译:此前一天，官方数据显示，由于需求大幅放缓，日本 9 月份工厂产出增幅远低于预期。

Japanese machinery makers like Fanuc (6954.T) and Murata Manufacturing (6981.T) recently reported weak six-month earnings due to sluggish Chinese demand.翻译:日本机械制造商发那科（Fanuc，6954.T）和村田制作所（Murata Manufacturing，6981.T）最近报告称，由于中国需求低迷，六个月盈利疲弱。

South Korea's factory activity fell for the 16th straight month while PMIs from Taiwan, Vietnam and Malaysia also showed continued declines in activity.翻译:韩国工厂活动连续第 16 个月下降，而台湾、越南和马来西亚的 PMI 也显示活动持续下降。

India's factory activity growth also slowed for a second straight month in October as softer demand which and the rising cost of raw materials weighed on business confidence.翻译:印度十月份工厂活动增长也连续第二个月放缓，原因是需求疲软和原材料成本上涨打压了商业信心。

"The October PMIs for emerging Asia generally dropped back further inside contractionary territory," said Shivaan Tandon, emerging Asia economist at Capital Economics.翻译:凯投宏观 (Capital Economics) 亚洲新兴市场经济学家 Shivaan Tandon 表示：“亚洲新兴市场 10 月份 PMI 普遍进一步回落至收缩区间。”

"The outlook for manufacturing in the region remains bleak in the near term as elevated inventory levels and weaker foreign demand are set to curtail production."翻译:“由于库存水平上升和外国需求疲软将限制产量，该地区制造业的前景短期内仍然黯淡。”

The International Monetary Fund (IMF) has warned that China's weak recovery and the risk of a more protracted property crisis could further dent Asia's economic prospects.翻译:国际货币基金组织（IMF）警告称，中国复苏乏力以及房地产危机更持久的风险可能会进一步削弱亚洲的经济前景。

In its World Economic Outlook released last month, the IMF cut next year's growth estimate for Asia to 4.2% from 4.4% projected in April, and down from 4.6% forecast for this year.翻译:国际货币基金组织在上个月发布的《世界经济展望》中将亚洲明年的增长预期从4月份的4.4%下调至4.2%，也低于今年的4.6%。

Reporting by Leika Kihara. Editing by Sam Holmes翻译:木原莱卡报道。山姆·霍姆斯编辑
item.author: Leika Kihara

item.title: 非洲服装业的未来如何取决于美国国会
item.description:
Summary:
  • AGOA duty free trade programme expires in 2025翻译:AGOA 免税贸易计划将于 2025 年到期
  • African governments calling for early renewal翻译:非洲各国政府呼吁尽早更新
  • Companies moving out of China after pandemic翻译:疫情过后企业撤离中国
  • Industry warns of missed opportunities, uncertain future翻译:行业警告错失良机，未来不确定

Norah Nasimiyu knows the future of Kenya's garment trade, which has employed her for 13 years and helped her put six children through school and university, lies in the hands of the U.S. Congress.翻译:诺拉·纳西米尤 (Norah Nasimiyu) 知道肯尼亚服装贸易的未来掌握在美国国会手中，该贸易已经雇用了她 13 年，并帮助她供六个孩子完成了中学和大学学业。

And like others, she is worried.翻译:和其他人一样，她也很担心。

U.S. officials visiting South Africa this week to meet African trade ministers will face calls to reauthorise the African Growth and Opportunity Act (AGOA) which expires in 2025.翻译:本周访问南非与非洲贸易部长会面的美国官员将面临重新授权将于 2025 年到期的《非洲增长与机会法案》(AGOA) 的呼声。

Despite longstanding bipartisan support from lawmakers, who view Washington's flagship African trade initiative as critical to taking on China, deep dysfunction on Capitol Hill and divisions over the need for updates have raised doubts.翻译:尽管两党议员长期支持，他们认为华盛顿的旗舰非洲贸易倡议对于对抗中国至关重要，但国会山的严重功能失调以及对更新必要性的分歧引发了质疑。

Apparel companies and industry insiders warn that Africa risks a once-in-a-generation shift away from Chinese manufacturing passing it by, with an estimated 240,000 to 290,000 jobs such as Nasimiyu's under threat.翻译:服装公司和业内人士警告称，非洲面临着一代人一次的中国制造业转移的风险，估计有 24 万至 29 万个工作岗位（例如 Nasimiyu 的工作岗位）受到威胁。

"We are praying that they extend," the single mother said during a break from stitching Levi's jeans at a Nairobi factory. "It is very hard to get a job here in Kenya."翻译:“我们祈祷它们能够延长，”这位单亲母亲在内罗毕一家工厂缝制李维斯牛仔裤的间隙说道。 “在肯尼亚找到工作非常困难。”

Apparel has been the standout success story of AGOA, which launched in 2000 to help develop African economies and foster democracy.翻译:服装业是 AGOA 的杰出成功案例，该组织于 2000 年启动，旨在帮助发展非洲经济和促进民主。

African apparel exports under the programme reached nearly $1.4 billion last year, double the amount pre-AGOA.翻译:去年，该计划下的非洲服装出口额达到近 14 亿美元，是《非洲增长机会法案》实施前的两倍。

Pankaj Bedi, chairman of UAL and Norah Nasimiyu's employer, said AGOA's duty free access to the world's biggest consumer market is the reason his company - Kenya's largest garment producer - exists.翻译:UAL 董事长兼诺拉·纳西米尤 (Norah Nasimiyu) 的雇主潘卡吉·贝迪 (Pankaj Bedi) 表示，AGOA 能够免税进入全球最大的消费市场，这是他的公司（肯尼亚最大的服装生产商）存在的原因。

"Almost 100% of what we are exporting goes to the U.S."翻译:“我们出口的产品几乎 100% 销往美国”

BYPASSING AFRICA

Industry insiders and policymakers see a chance to build on that success as companies reduce their dependence on China in the wake of the pandemic and subsequent supply chain headaches.翻译:业内人士和政策制定者看到了在这一成功的基础上再接再厉的机会，因为在疫情和随后的供应链问题之后，企业减少了对中国的依赖。

"We've been struck by how open the opportunity is now for us," South African Trade Minister Ebrahim Patel said last week.翻译:南非贸易部长易卜拉欣·帕特尔上周表示：“我们对现在的机会如此开放感到震惊。”

Nearly 80% of companies polled in a July survey by the United States Fashion Industry Association (USFIA) planned to reduce Chinese sourcing over the next two years.翻译:美国时装工业协会 (USFIA) 7 月份的一项调查显示，近 80% 的公司计划在未来两年内减少从中国采购。

"Many of them talk about Africa," said Stephen Lamar, CEO of the American Apparel and Footwear Association.翻译:“他们中的许多人都在谈论非洲，”美国服装和鞋类协会首席执行官斯蒂芬·拉马尔说。

Capturing even a fraction of that business could prove transformative for Africa. But companies need clarity, he said, adding: "If it is not renewed until two years from now, these current investment decisions are going to bypass Africa".翻译:即使只占据这一业务的一小部分，也可能会给非洲带来变革。但他表示，企业需要明确，并补充道：“如果两年后才更新，目前的投资决策将绕过非洲”。

That lack of clarity is not only hitting new investments.翻译:这种缺乏明确性不仅影响了新投资。

The USFIA survey found that 45% of respondents had already reduced sourcing from AGOA countries over renewal uncertainty, while another 45% plan to cut sourcing from the continent if there is no reauthorisation by June 2024.翻译:USFIA 调查发现，由于更新的不确定性，45% 的受访者已经减少了从 AGOA 国家的采购，而另外 45% 的受访者计划如果在 2024 年 6 月之前没有重新授权，则减少从非洲大陆的采购。

'COLLAPSE'

African governments are pushing for a similar reauthorisation to the 10-year AGOA extension approved by Congress in 2015 with bipartisan support, ideally before an expected U.S. election year pause on new trade legislation.翻译:非洲各国政府正在推动对 2015 年国会在两党支持下批准的 AGOA 延期 10 年进行类似的重新授权，最好是在美国大选年暂停新贸易立法之前。

But that is looking increasingly unlikely.翻译:但这看起来越来越不可能。

"There's a high level of uncertainty about what happens and the context keeps shifting," said Michael Walsh, a senior fellow at the Philadelphia-based Foreign Policy Research Institute.翻译:费城外交政策研究所高级研究员迈克尔·沃尔什表示：“发生的事情存在很大的不确定性，而且环境不断变化。”

Amid deepening global polarisation, Moscow, Beijing and the West are all leveraging trade and economic ties as they step up efforts to court African governments.翻译:在全球两极分化日益加深的背景下，莫斯科、北京和西方国家都在利用贸易和经济关系，加紧努力讨好非洲各国政府。

More than a dozen U.S. senators are pushing for a quick AGOA renewal arguing the need to "counter the malign influence of China, Russia, and other foreign actors".翻译:十几名美国参议员正在推动快速更新《非洲增长机会法案》，认为需要“对抗中国、俄罗斯和其他外国行为体的恶意影响”。

But the House of Representatives, paralysed for weeks by factional fighting over its speakership, faces a daunting list of must-pass legislation.翻译:但众议院因议长席位的派系斗争而瘫痪了数周，面临着一系列必须通过的立法，令人望而生畏。

And there is another obstacle to a quick reauthorisation, namely a well-intentioned desire to improve AGOA.翻译:快速重新授权还有另一个障碍，即改善 AGOA 的善意愿望。

The U.S. International Trade Commission (USITC) in a report earlier this year highlighted major shortcomings.翻译:美国国际贸易委员会（USITC）在今年早些时候的一份报告中强调了主要缺陷。

More than 80% of duty-free non-petroleum AGOA exports, for example, came from South Africa, Kenya, Lesotho, Madagascar and Ethiopia.翻译:例如，超过 80% 的免税非石油 AGOA 出口来自南非、肯尼亚、莱索托、马达加斯加和埃塞俄比亚。

"Some countries have benefited greatly from AGOA, but the majority have not," Constance Hamilton, the Biden administration's top trade official for Africa, said last week, calling for Congress to consider changes that would "make the programme more impactful".翻译:拜登政府负责非洲事务的最高贸易官员康斯坦斯·汉密尔顿(Constance Hamilton)上周表示，“一些国家从《非洲增长和机会法案》中受益匪浅，但大多数国家并未受益。”她呼吁国会考虑进行改革，以“使该计划更具影响力”。

Such talk worries apparel company executives, who point to the troubled fate of the Generalized System of Preferences (GSP) - the largest and oldest U.S. trade preference programme.翻译:这样的言论让服装公司的高管们感到担忧，他们指出普惠制（GSP）——美国最大、最古老的贸易优惠计划——的命运多舛。

Congress failed to renew GSP before it expired at the end of 2020 and its reauthorisation remains bogged down in gridlock between the House and Senate over eligibility requirement changes.翻译:国会未能在普惠制于 2020 年底到期之前续签，其重新授权仍因参众两院因资格要求变更而陷入僵局。

Attempts to change AGOA risk creating a similar impasse, said Greg Poole, Senior Advisor for Global Sourcing at clothing company The Children's Place (PLCE.O).翻译:服装公司 The Children's Place (PLCE.O)的全球采购高级顾问 Greg Poole 表示，试图改变 AGOA 的风险可能会造成类似的僵局。

"If we try to radically change AGOA, it's going to get stalled out. And if it gets stalled out, it's going to follow the path of GSP," he said.翻译:“如果我们试图从根本上改变《非洲增长和机会法案》，它就会陷入停滞。如果它陷入停滞，它将走上普惠制的道路，”他说。

There is little doubt what would happen in AGOA's absence.翻译:毫无疑问，如果 AGOA 缺席，将会发生什么。

The USITC report said AGOA benefits "appear to be essential for ... countries to maintain their apparel exports to the United States".翻译:美国国际贸易委员会的报告称，AGOA 的好处“似乎对于……各国维持对美国的服装出口至关重要”。

It pointed to a temporary suspension of Madagascar's AGOA benefits in 2009, which cost it 50,000 to 100,000 jobs, while Ethiopia lost 100,000 jobs when it was suspended last year.翻译:报告指出，2009年马达加斯加暂时中止了AGOA福利，导致该国失去了5万至10万个工作岗位，而埃塞俄比亚在去年暂停福利时也损失了10万个工作岗位。

In Kenya, UAL Chairman Bedi remains hopeful, but knows how things will play out if AGOA evaporates.翻译:在肯尼亚，UAL 主席贝迪仍然充满希望，但他知道如果 AGOA 消失，事情将会如何发展。

"All the companies which are here will be gone for sure, including mine ... The industry will collapse."翻译:“这里的所有公司肯定都会消失，包括我的……这个行业将会崩溃。”

Reporting by Joe Bavier in Johannesburg and Duncan Miriri in Nairobi; Editing by Alexander Smith翻译:乔·巴维尔 (Joe Bavier) 驻约翰内斯堡和邓肯·米里里 (Duncan Miriri) 驻内罗毕的报道；亚历山大·史密斯编辑
item.author: Joe Bavier, Duncan Miriri

item.title: 中国最大的南极船队出发建设科考站
item.description:
Two Chinese icebreaker research vessels and a cargo ship set sail on Wednesday for the Antarctic with more than 460 personnel on board to help complete construction of China's fifth station on the world's southernmost continent.翻译:周三，两艘中国破冰船和一艘货船载着460多名人员启航前往南极，帮助完成中国在世界最南端大陆的第五个科考站的建设。

China's biggest flotilla of research vessels deployed to the Antarctic will focus on building the station on the rocky, windswept Inexpressible Island near the Ross Sea, a deep Southern Ocean bay named after a 19th century British explorer.翻译:中国部署在南极洲的最大的科考船队将重点在罗斯海附近岩石多、多风的不可表达岛上建设该站。罗斯海是一个南大洋深海湾，以一位 19 世纪英国探险家的名字命名。

Work on the first Chinese station in the Pacific sector began in 2018. It will be used to conduct research on the region's environment, state television reported.翻译:中国在太平洋地区的第一个站的建设工作于 2018 年开始。据国家电视台报道，该站将用于对该地区的环境进行研究。

China has four research stations in the Antarctic built from 1985 to 2014. A U.S.-based think tank estimated the fifth could be finished next year.翻译:1985年至2014年间，中国在南极建立了四个科考站。一家美国智囊团估计第五个科考站可能会在明年竣工。

The facility is expected to include an observatory with a satellite ground station, and should help China "fill in a major gap" in its ability to access the continent, the Center for Strategic and International Studies (CSIS) said in a report this year.翻译:战略与国际研究中心（CSIS）在今年的一份报告中表示，该设施预计将包括一个带有卫星地面站的天文台，并将有助于中国“填补其进入非洲大陆的能力的重大空白”。

The station is also well situated to collect signals intelligence over Australia and New Zealand and telemetry data on rockets launched from Australia's new Arnhem Space Centre, it said.翻译:该站位置优越，可以收集澳大利亚和新西兰的信号情报以及从澳大利亚新阿纳姆航天中心发射的火箭的遥测数据。

China rejects suggestions that its stations would be used for espionage.翻译:中国否认其电台将被用于间谍活动的说法。

The two icebreakers, Xuelong 1 and Xuelong 2, the name means "Snow Dragon" in Chinese, set sail from Shanghai with mostly personnel and logistics supplies on board.翻译:两艘破冰船“雪龙一号”和“雪龙二号”从上海起航，船上主要载有人员和后勤物资。

The cargo ship "Tianhui", or "Divine Blessings", taking construction material for the station, set off from the eastern port of Zhangjiagang.翻译:“天惠”号货船装载着车站建设材料，从张家港东部港口出发。

The five-month mission will include a survey on the impact of climate change.翻译:为期五个月的任务将包括对气候变化影响的调查。

The two icebreakers will also conduct environmental surveys in the Prydez Bay, the Astronaut Sea in southeast Antarctic, and in the Ross Sea and Amundsen Sea in the west.翻译:两艘破冰船还将在普里兹湾、南极东南部的宇航员海以及西部的罗斯海和阿蒙森海进行环境调查。

The mission, China's 40th to the Antarctic, will also cooperate with countries including the United States, Britain, and Russia on logistics supply, state media said.翻译:官方媒体称，这是中国第40次前往南极，还将与美国、英国和俄罗斯等国家在后勤供应方面进行合作。

Reporting by Albee Zhang and Ryan Woo; editing by Robert Birsel翻译:Albee 张和 Ryan Woo 的报道；罗伯特·伯塞尔编辑

item.title: 独家：恒大拟境外债权人获得子公司30%股权
item.description:
China Evergrande (3333.HK) has proposed a new debt restructuring plan for offshore bondholders, offering to swap their debts into about a 30% equity stake in each of the developer's two Hong Kong-listed subsidiaries, according to two sources familiar with the matter.翻译:据两位知情人士透露，中国恒大（3333.HK）已向境外债券持有人提出一项新的债务重组计划，提议将其债务转换为该开发商两家香港上市子公司各约30%的股权。

The property firm's offshore bondholders holding about $19 billion of debt are likely to take a major haircut on their investments if they agree to the new terms, said the two sources who declined to be named because they were not authorised to speak with media.翻译:两位因无权接受媒体采访而拒绝透露姓名的消息人士表示，该房地产公司持有约 190 亿美元债务的离岸债券持有人，如果同意新条款，他们的投资可能会大幅削减。

Evergrande did not respond to a request for comment.翻译:恒大没有回应置评请求。

The property developer's dollar bonds last traded at about 2.25 cents on the dollar on Tuesday, according to LSEG data, as bondholders weigh the possible recoveries in the revised restructuring plan against other options like a winding up.翻译:根据伦敦证券交易所数据，周二，该房地产开发商的美元债券最新交易价格约为 2.25 美分，债券持有人正在权衡修订后的重组计划可能带来的复苏与清盘等其他选择。

A lawyer for representing an ad hoc group of key bondholders told a Hong Kong court on Monday the restructuring plan could have a higher recovery rate for creditors than a liquidation scenario of less than 3%.翻译:代表主要债券持有人特别小组的律师周一向香港法院表示，与清算方案相比，重组计划可能为债权人带来更高的回收率（低于 3%）。

Shares in the units the bondholders will be offered the stake in, Evergrande Property Services Group (6666.HK) and Evergrande New Energy Vehicle Group (NEV) (0708.HK), have fallen by more than 80% this year amid Evergrande's debt woes.翻译:恒大物业服务集团（6666.HK）和恒大新能源汽车集团（0708.HK）等债券持有人将被发售的股份今年以来在恒大债务困境中已下跌超过80% 。

Their combined market value was only around HK$9 billion ($1.15 billion) as of Wednesday morning, with the parent holding 52% of the property arm and 59% of the vehicle firm.翻译:截至周三上午，两家公司的总市值仅为 90 亿港元（11.5 亿美元）左右，母公司持有该房地产部门 52% 的股份和该汽车公司 59% 的股份。

Creditors would be given existing shares of the two units, the first source said, in a deal that would need to be approved by Chinese regulators.翻译:第一位消息人士称，债权人将获得这两个部门的现有股份，这笔交易需要得到中国监管机构的批准。

The new plan was raised with some bondholders about two weeks ago, the first source added, after Evergrande's original debt restructuring plan was thrown off course when its billionaire founder Hui Ka Yan was in late September confirmed to be under investigation for suspected criminal activities.翻译:第一位消息人士补充说，大约两周前，恒大集团最初的债务重组计划因亿万富翁创始人许家印被证实因涉嫌犯罪活动而接受调查而被打乱，大约两周前向一些债券持有人提出了这项新计划。

Evergrande was also banned from issuing new dollar bonds, a key part of its original restructuring plan, while its flagship mainland unit was being investigated by regulators.翻译:恒大集团还被禁止发行新的美元债券，这是其最初重组计划的关键部分，而其内地旗舰企业正在接受监管机构的调查。

The second source said the new plan was driven by a work committee under the southern Guangdong provincial government that has been overseeing Evegrande's restructuring since late 2021, after the developer defaulted on its debts. The provincial government did not respond to a request for comment.翻译:第二位消息人士称，这项新计划是由广东省南部省政府下属的一个工作委员会推动的，自 2021 年底以来，在恒大拖欠债务后，该委员会一直负责监督恒大的重组工作。省政府没有回应置评请求。

The renewed proposal will be key to Evergrande's survival as the company was on Monday ordered by a Hong Kong court to form a concrete debt restructuring plan before a liquidation hearing on Dec. 4, which will decide whether it should be wound up.翻译:更新后的提议将是恒大生存的关键，因为香港法院周一命令该公司在 12 月 4 日的清算听证会之前制定具体的债务重组计划，该听证会将决定是否应该清盘。

Evergrande's original plan, which was backed by the ad hoc group of bondholders before it was thrown off course, offered options including equity-linked instruments backed by the parent Evergrande and the two Hong Kong-listed subsidiaries.翻译:恒大最初的计划在偏离轨道之前得到了临时债券持有人小组的支持，该计划提供了包括由母公司恒大和两家香港上市子公司支持的股票挂钩工具在内的期权。

Creditors were allowed to either swap all of their holdings into new notes with maturities of 10 to 12 years, or convert them into different combinations of new notes with tenors of five to nine years and equity-linked instruments, with no direct haircut.翻译:债权人可以将其持有的全部资产交换为期限为 10 至 12 年的新票据，或将其转换为期限为 5 至 9 年的新票据和股票挂钩工具的不同组合，且没有直接折扣。

The biggest challenge ahead for Evergrande will be convincing its creditors and shareholders in the two Hong Kong-listed units that the new proposal is worthwhile, industry experts said.翻译:业内专家表示，恒大面临的最大挑战将是让两家香港上市公司的债权人和股东相信新提议是值得的。

A key group of creditors, categorized as Class C by Evergrande, including private lenders, some Chinese banks and pre-IPO investors had opposed the old plan and demanded better terms before it collapsed.翻译:被恒大归类为C级的关键债权人群体，包括私人贷款机构、一些中资银行和IPO前的投资者，反对旧计划，并在计划崩溃前要求更好的条款。

The ad hoc group of bondholders is unhappy about the revised terms offering equity in the Hong Kong-listed subsidiaries, according to sources.翻译:据消息人士透露，债券持有人特别小组对香港上市子公司股权修订后的条款感到不满。

($1 = 7.8239 Hong Kong dollars)翻译:(1 美元 = 7.8239 港元)

item.title: 中国新经济沙皇面临效仿前任的挑战
item.description:
China's new "economic tsar" He Lifeng is emerging as one of President Xi Jinping's most powerful lieutenants, but some sources say he is yet to gain the standing of his predecessor in financial markets and the diplomat community.翻译:中国新任“经济沙皇”何立峰正在成为习近平主席最有权势的副手之一，但一些消息人士称，他尚未在金融市场和外交界获得其前任的地位。

He, 68, replaced internationally respected Liu He as one of China's four vice premiers during its annual parliament session in March. The full scope of his portfolio had been largely unclear until Sunday when state media referred to him as the director of a powerful Communist Party economic body.翻译:68 岁的他在 3 月份的年度全国人大会议上取代了享有国际声誉的刘鹤，成为中国四位副总理之一。直到周日官方媒体称他为一个强大的共产党经济机构的主任之前，他的全部职责范围基本上还不清楚。

He is also tipped by China watchers to become the head of the new Central Financial Commission, China's highest ranking financial watchdog, which is being set up to strengthen the Party's control of the country's $61 trillion financial industry.翻译:中国观察家还预测他将成为新的中央金融委员会主席，这是中国最高级别的金融监管机构，其成立的目的是加强党对中国价值 61 万亿美元的金融业的控制。

That puts him in charge with tackling the local government debt crunch and the downturn in the property sector, two crises that economists say threaten to wipe out much of the long-term growth potential in the world's second-largest economy.翻译:这让他负责解决地方政府债务紧缩和房地产行业低迷的问题，经济学家称这两场危机有可能消除这个世界第二大经济体的大部分长期增长潜力。

He joined Xi on his first known visit to China's central bank last month and is also playing a prominent role in trade talks with Washington and Europe in an increasingly tense geopolitical environment.翻译:上个月，他与习近平一起对中国央行进行了首次已知的访问，并且在日益紧张的地缘政治环境中，他还在与华盛顿和欧洲的贸易谈判中发挥了重要作用。

"He is very much not in the same league as Liu He," said a diplomat involved in recent trade talks with China, describing him as "tough and uncompromising" and not interacting in English with his interlocutors.翻译:一位最近参与与中国贸易谈判的外交官表示，“他与刘鹤根本不是一个档次”，他形容刘鹤“强硬、不妥协”，并且不会用英语与对话者互动。

Harvard-trained Liu's influence on policies often overshadowed the largely sidelined former Premier Li Keqiang, who died of a heart attack last week, policy insiders said.翻译:政策内部人士表示，毕业于哈佛大学的刘鹤对政策的影响力常常盖过了基本上被边缘化的前总理李克强，李克强上周因心脏病去世。

Liu was seen as the brains behind some key early industrial and financial reforms that set China up for some staggering growth rates in recent decades.翻译:刘鹤被视为早期一些关键工业和金融改革背后的智囊，这些改革使中国在近几十年来取得了惊人的增长率。

By contrast, He is seen as more of a bureaucrat.翻译:相比之下，他更像是一个官僚。

"He Lifeng mainly implements policies from the top leader," said a policy adviser who spoke on condition of anonymity, referring to Xi.翻译:“何立峰主要执行最高领导人的政策，”一位不愿透露姓名的政策顾问表示，他指的是习近平。

LOW-PROFILE

Beijing is unleashing a round of stimulus to shore up the economic recovery but economists warn China could be headed for a long period of very low growth without deep structural reforms and a cleanup of the property sector and local finances.翻译:北京正在推出新一轮刺激措施以支撑经济复苏，但经济学家警告称，如果不进行深入的结构性改革以及房地产行业和地方财政的整顿，中国可能会陷入长期的极低增长。

While Liu often held long speeches and published articles on policy and reform issues, He has kept a relatively low-profile since March.翻译:尽管刘鹤经常就政策和改革问题发表长篇演讲并发表文章，但自三月份以来，他一直保持相对低调。

Investors and economists have grown frustrated with China's lack of concrete policy measures to achieve its goals of boosting domestic consumption and decisively tackling municipal debt problems.翻译:投资者和经济学家对中国缺乏具体政策措施来实现刺激国内消费和果断解决市政债务问题的目标感到沮丧。

"He is low-profile and cautious, partly because the cabinet's own power has been downgraded under the new structure," said the policy adviser.翻译:这位政策顾问表示：“他低调而谨慎，部分原因是内阁自身权力在新结构下被下调。”

Under Xi, the ruling Communist Party has increased its decision-making power on key policy changes, leaving limited room for the State Council, or the cabinet, to set the agenda.翻译:在习近平的领导下，执政的共产党增强了对重大政策变化的决策权，为国务院或内阁制定议程留下了有限的空间。

"He used to work in the system of economic planning for a long time and he should be familiar with macroeconomic control especially in the real economy sector," said a second policy adviser who spoke on condition of anonymity.翻译:另一位不愿透露姓名的政策顾问表示：“他曾在经济计划系统工作过很长时间，应该熟悉宏观经济调控，尤其是实体经济领域。”

"Now under the leadership of the Party ... there will be closer cooperation among the top economic planner, central bank and the finance ministry."翻译:“现在在党的领导下……最高经济规划者、央行和财政部之间将有更密切的合作。”

A home-groomed economist who studied finance at Xiamen University from 1978 to 1984, He obtained a doctorate in economics in 1998, when he was the party chief of Quanzhou city in Fujian.翻译:土生土长的经济学家，1978年至1984年就读于厦门大学金融系，1998年获得经济学博士学位，时任福建泉州市委书记。

He's relationship with Xi dates back four decades. He first worked under Xi in the coastal city of Xiamen and later in the northern municipality of Tianjin.翻译:他与习近平的关系可以追溯到四十年前。他首先在沿海城市厦门在习近平手下工作，后来又到北方直辖市天津工作。

In the 1980s, He attended the ceremony when Xi married his second wife, the popular singer Peng Liyuan, sources have said.翻译:消息人士称，20 世纪 80 年代，习近平与第二任妻子、流行歌手彭丽媛结婚时，贺建奎出席了婚礼。

In 2014, He was named vice chairman of the National Development and Reform Commission, the state planning agency, before taking full control in 2017. Since then He has joined Xi on domestic tours, in diplomatic meetings and in other engagements.翻译:2014年，贺建奎被任命为国家发展和改革委员会副主任，并于2017年全面接管国家发展和改革委员会的职务。此后，贺建奎与习近平一起进行国内访问、外交会议和其他活动。

"Due to his close ties and loyalty to Xi, it's easy for him to take policy guidance from the top and implement it," said a third policy adviser. "His obvious shortcoming is that he has not directly managed the financial sector."翻译:第三位政策顾问表示：“由于他与习近平关系密切且忠诚，他很容易接受高层的政策指导并加以实施。” “他明显的缺点是没有直接管理金融领域。”

Reporting by Kevin Yao, Laurie Chen, Joe Cash and Ellen Zhang; Editing by Marius Zaharia and Lincoln Feast.翻译:Kevin Yao、Laurie Chen、Joe Cash 和 Ellen 张 报道；马吕斯·扎哈里亚和林肯·费斯特编辑。
item.author: Kevin Yao, Laurie Chen

item.title: 什么是亚太经合组织？亚太地区领导人前往旧金山
item.description:
Leaders from the 21-member Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation forum will meet in San Francisco this month for the 30th APEC summit, the first hosted by the United States since 2011.翻译:亚太经合组织 21 个成员国的领导人将于本月在旧金山举行第 30 届亚太经合组织峰会，这是自 2011 年以来首次由美国主办。

WHAT IS THIS YEAR'S LIKELY HIGHLIGHT?

Like most international gatherings, APEC has become a stage for strategic competition between the U.S. and China, the world's two largest economies, and all eyes will be on an expected bilateral summit on the sidelines between U.S. President Joe Biden and Chinese President Xi Jinping.翻译:与大多数国际聚会一样，亚太经合组织已成为美国和中国这两个世界最大经济体之间战略竞争的舞台，所有人的目光都集中在美国总统乔·拜登和中国国家主席习近平之间即将举行的双边峰会上。

Xi has yet to confirm his APEC attendance, but a meeting between the pair would be their second in person since Biden took office in January 2021. They first met at the G20 summit in Bali a year ago.翻译:习近平尚未​​确认出席亚太经合组织会议，但两人的会面将是拜登 2021 年 1 月上任以来第二次亲自会面。一年前，他们在巴厘岛举行的 G20 峰会上首次会面。

APEC leaders are due to gather between Nov. 15-17. From Nov. 11 senior APEC finance officials and ministers will meet ahead of the summit, while the annual APEC CEO summit will run from Nov. 14-16.翻译:APEC 领导人将于 11 月 15 日至 17 日期间举行会议。从 11 月 11 日起，亚太经合组织高级财务官员和部长将在峰会前举行会议，而年度亚太经合组织首席执行官峰会将于 11 月 14 日至 16 日举行。

WHAT IS APEC?

APEC was founded in Canberra in 1989 as an informal dialogue forum to promote regional economic integration. It initially had 12 members. Now it has expanded to involve more than 100 meetings a year.翻译:APEC于1989年在堪培拉成立，是一个促进区域经济一体化的非正式对话论坛。它最初有 12 名成员。现在，它已扩大到每年举行 100 多次会议。

APEC membership covers 38% of the global population, or nearly 3 billion people, about 62% of GDP, and almost half of global trade.翻译:APEC成员覆盖全球38%的人口，即近30亿人，约占GDP的62%，以及近一半的全球贸易。

APEC says it operates on the basis of non-binding commitments, open dialogue and equal respect for the views of all participants. Decisions are reached by consensus and commitments undertaken on a voluntary basis.翻译:APEC表示，其运作建立在不具约束力的承诺、公开对话和平等尊重所有参与者观点的基础上。决定是在自愿的基础上通过协商一致和承诺做出的。

APEC'S MEMBERSHIP

APEC's members are: Australia, Brunei, Canada, Chile, China, Hong Kong, Indonesia, Japan, South Korea, Malaysia, Mexico, New Zealand, Papua New Guinea, Peru, the Philippines, Russia, Singapore, Taiwan, Thailand, the United States and Vietnam.翻译:APEC成员有：澳大利亚、文莱、加拿大、智利、中国、香港、印度尼西亚、日本、韩国、马来西亚、墨西哥、新西兰、巴布亚新几内亚、秘鲁、菲律宾、俄罗斯、新加坡、台湾、泰国、美国州和越南。

It is unique in grouping member economies rather than nations, allowing participation of Chinese-ruled Hong Kong, as well as self-ruled Taiwan, which China claims as it own. It does not include India, however, the world's most populous country.翻译:它的独特之处在于将成员经济体而不是国家分组，允许中国统治的香港以及中国声称拥有台湾主权的自治台湾参与其中。然而，它不包括世界上人口最多的国家印度。

Attempts by India to join APEC were stymied for decades - first because its economy was not integrated into the global system and then by a membership freeze.翻译:印度加入亚太经合组织的尝试数十年来一直受阻——首先是因为其经济没有融入全球体系，然后是成员资格冻结。

Taiwan presidents do not attend APEC summits, but the island is represented either by senior former officials or business leaders, such as Morris Chang, founder of semiconductor maker TSMC (2330.TW) who went to the Bangkok summit last year.翻译:台湾领导人不参加APEC峰会，但该岛的代表要么是前高级官员，要么是商界领袖，例如去年参加了曼谷峰会的半导体制造商台积电（2330.TW）创始人张忠谋。

CURRENT CONTROVERSIES

Hong Kong's representation has become controversial. Washington, as host, is in charge of the guest list and in July U.S. congressional aides told Reuters Hong Kong's chief executive, John Lee, would not be invited as he is under U.S. human-rights sanctions.翻译:香港的代表权引起争议。华盛顿作为东道主负责制定嘉宾名单，7月，美国国会助手告诉路透社，香港特首李家超不会受邀，因为他受到美国的人权制裁。

The Hong Kong government said Lee would not attend due to "scheduling issues" and Financial Secretary Paul Chan would go to San Francisco instead.翻译:香港政府表示，李光耀因“日程安排问题”而不会出席，财政司司长陈茂波将前往旧金山。

Russia's participation became divisive after it invaded Ukraine last year and its president, Vladimir Putin, did not attend the 2022 summit in Bangkok. The State Department has said Putin will not be in San Francisco.翻译:俄罗斯去年入侵乌克兰，且其总统弗拉基米尔·普京没有出席 2022 年曼谷峰会，此后俄罗斯的参与引发了分歧。美国国务院表示普京不会前往旧金山。

Drafting a final summit declaration this year will be difficult due to divisions between members over conflicts in Ukraine and the Middle East.翻译:由于成员国之间在乌克兰和中东冲突问题上存在分歧，今年起草最终峰会宣言将会很困难。

In Bangkok last year leaders endorsed a text vowing to uphold and strengthen a rules-based multilateral trading system while noting "most" of them condemned Russia's war in Ukraine.翻译:去年在曼谷，领导人签署了一份文本，誓言维护和加强基于规则的多边贸易体系，同时指出“大多数”领导人谴责俄罗斯在乌克兰的战争。

Matt Goodman, a trade expert who was White House coordinator for the 2011 APEC summit, said smaller groups of like-minded states could issue their own statements.翻译:担任 2011 年 APEC 峰会白宫协调员的贸易专家马特·古德曼 (Matt Goodman) 表示，志同道合的国家小团体可以发表自己的声明。

"Given the make up of APEC with Russia and China both members, it's more difficult than ever to really come up with some tangible outcomes," he said.翻译:他说：“鉴于亚太经合组织的成员包括俄罗斯和中国，真正取得一些切实成果比以往任何时候都更加困难。”

BUZZWORDS

The U.S. has chosen the theme "Creating a Resilient and Sustainable Future for All" for APEC 2023. It says it aims for an "interconnected, innovative, and inclusive" region and "to advance a free, fair, and open economic policy agenda that benefits U.S. workers, businesses, and families. "翻译:美国为2023年APEC选择了“为所有人创造一个有弹性和可持续的未来”的主题。它表示，其目标是建立一个“互联、创新和包容”的地区，并“推进自由、公平和开放的经济政策议程，使美国工人、企业和家庭受益。”

As of 2021, APEC members made up seven of the United States' top 10 overall trading partners.翻译:截至2021年，APEC成员占美国十大贸易伙伴中的七个。

Goodman expects the U.S. to highlight the relative strength of its economy in challenging times - a veiled comparison with difficulties China has faced after years of spectacular growth.翻译:古德曼预计，美国将在充满挑战的时期强调其经济的相对实力——与中国在经历了多年的惊人增长后所面临的困难进行含蓄的比较。

He said Washington would seek to highlight progress in the 14-nation Indo-Pacific Economic Framework (IPEF) it created to boost engagement after former President Donald Trump quit a regional trade pact in 2017.翻译:他表示，在前总统唐纳德·特朗普于 2017 年退出区域贸易协定后，华盛顿将寻求强调 14 国印太经济框架 ( IPEF ) 的进展，该框架是为了加强参与而创建的。

FASHION SHOW

Traditionally APEC leaders wear local costume for a final-day group photo. This started in 1993 when President Bill Clinton prescribed bomber jackets in Seattle.翻译:按照传统，亚太经合组织领导人在最后一天合影时会穿着当地服装。这始于 1993 年，当时比尔·克林顿总统在西雅图规定了飞行员夹克。

President Barack Obama, however, broke with tradition in 2011 by not ordering up the Hawaiian shirts that are de rigueur holiday attire on the islands. Whether and how San Francisco rises to the occasion remains to be seen.翻译:然而，美国总统巴拉克·奥巴马 (Barack Obama) 在 2011 年打破了传统，没有订购夏威夷群岛上必备的度假服装——夏威夷衬衫。旧金山能否以及如何应对这一局面还有待观察。

Reporting by David Brunnstrom in Washington Additional reporting by Michael Martina in Washington Editing by Michelle Nichols and Matthew Lewis翻译:大卫·布伦斯特罗姆 (David Brunnstrom) 在华盛顿的报道 迈克尔·马丁纳 (Michael Martina) 在华盛顿的补充报道 米歇尔·尼科尔斯 (Michelle Nichols) 和马修·刘易斯 (Matthew Lewis) 编辑

item.title: 韩国出口摆脱长达一年的低迷，中国需求复苏缓慢
item.description:
South Korea's exports in October rose in annual terms for the first time in 13 months, as shipments to the United States were robust while the weakness in China demand eased slowly.翻译:韩国 10 月份出口同比增长 13 个月来首次增长，原因是对美国的出口强劲，而中国需求疲软的情况缓慢缓解。

Overseas sales last month by Asia's fourth-largest economy rose 5.1% year-on-year to $55.09 billion, trade data showed on Wednesday. That, however, was weaker than a median 5.5% gain tipped in a Reuters survey of economists.翻译:周三贸易数据显示，亚洲第四大经济体上月海外销售额同比增长 5.1%，至 550.9 亿美元。然而，这低于路透社对经济学家的调查显示的 5.5% 的中值涨幅。

It swung from a 4.4% fall the previous month and marked the first year-on-year increase since September 2022.翻译:它扭转了上月下降 4.4% 的局面，并标志着自 2022 年 9 月以来首次同比增长。

By destination, exports to the United States gained 17.3%, the most since May 2022, while China-bound shipments fell 9.5%, the least in 13 months.翻译:按目的地划分，对美国的出口增长 17.3%，为 2022 年 5 月以来的最高水平，而对中国的出口下降 9.5%，为 13 个月来的最低水平。

Exports of cars rose 19.8%, extending gains to a 16th straight month, while petroleum products also jumped 18.0%, after seven straight months of decline.翻译:汽车出口增长 19.8%，连续第 16 个月增长；石油产品出口在连续 7 个月下降后也增长 18.0%。

Semiconductor shipments fell for the 15th consecutive month, but the 3.1% drop in October was the smallest in the streak.翻译:半导体出货量连续第 15 个月下降，但 10 月份的降幅为 3.1%，是连续跌幅最小的。

"Semiconductors, with their prices having bottomed out, are leading the recovery of exports, while China-bound exports are also improving slowly," said Lee Jeong-hoon, an analyst at Eugene Investment Securities.翻译:尤金投资证券公司分析师Lee Jeong-hoon表示，“半导体价格已经触底，正在引领出口复苏，而对中国的出口也在缓慢改善。”

"It is difficult to say China's economy is strong and there is uncertainty over demand in other major countries next year, but for the time being, exports will likely continue to recover," he said.翻译:“很难说中国经济强劲，明年其他主要国家的需求也存在不确定性，但就目前而言，出口可能会继续复苏，”他表示。

Trade Minister Bang Moon-kyu said after the data release the government would make a big push to ensure exports continue to improve through the end of the year, adding it would thoroughly manage risks such as the Israel-Hamas conflict and China's restrictions on graphite exports.翻译:贸易部长方文圭在数据发布后表示，政府将大力推动确保出口在年底前继续改善，并补充说将彻底管理以色列与哈马斯冲突和中国限制石墨出口等风险。

In October, South Korea's factory activity contracted for the 16th straight month, but the decline in new export orders softened, another survey showed on Wednesday. Still, demand in China was muted, according to the survey.翻译:周三的另一项调查显示，10 月份韩国工厂活动连续第 16 个月萎缩，但新出口订单降幅有所放缓。不过，调查显示，中国的需求依然疲软。

In China, manufacturing activity unexpectedly contracted in October, raising questions over the state of the country's fragile economic recovery at the start of the fourth quarter.翻译:在中国，10月份制造业活动意外收缩，引发了对该国第四季度初脆弱经济复苏状况的质疑。

South Korea's imports fell 9.7% to $53.46 billion in October, narrower than the 16.5% drop in the previous month but deeper than a 4.3% decline expected by economists.翻译:韩国10月份进口下降9.7%，至534.6亿美元，比上个月16.5%的降幅收窄，但比经济学家预期的4.3%的降幅更大。

As a result, the country posted a trade surplus of $1.64 billion in October, in contrast to economists' forecasts for a deficit.翻译:结果，该国 10 月份实现了 16.4 亿美元的贸易顺差，与经济学家预测的赤字形成鲜明对比。

Reporting by Jihoon Lee; Editing by Christian Schmollinger, Muralikumar Anantharaman and Sonali Paul翻译:李智勋报道；编辑：Christian Schmollinger、Muralikumar Anantharaman 和 Sonali Paul

item.title: 中国在出生率下降的情况下启动全国人口普查
item.description:
China will begin polling 1.4 million people on Wednesday in a survey on population changes, as authorities struggle to incentivise people to have more children amid a declining birth rate and the first population drop in more than six decades.翻译:中国将于周三开始对 140 万人进行人口变化调查，在出生率下降和六十多年来首次人口下降的情况下，当局努力激励人们生育更多孩子。

The poll, which was announced on Oct. 10 in an unexpected move, will focus on urban and rural areas throughout the country. The survey will be based on a sample of 500,000 households and last for around two weeks until Nov. 15, China's National Bureau of Statistics said.翻译:这项民意调查于10月10日出人意料地宣布，将重点关注全国城市和农村地区。中国国家统计局表示，此次调查将抽样50万户家庭，持续两周左右，直至11月15日。

It will help provide a basis to monitor China's population developmental changes and for the government and Communist Party to formulate national economic, social development and population related policies, it said.翻译:它将有助于监测中国人口发展变化，为政府和共产党制定国民经济、社会发展和人口相关政策提供依据。

China last conducted its once-in-a-decade census in November 2020 which showed it grew at the slowest pace since the first modern population survey in the 1950s.翻译:中国上一次进行十年一度的人口普查是在 2020 年 11 月，结果显示，中国的增长速度是自 20 世纪 50 年代第一次现代人口调查以来最慢的。

Population development has often been linked to the strength and "rejuvenation" of the country in state media amid the declining birth rate and widespread concerns by citizens on the difficulties of raising children.翻译:在出生率下降和公民普遍担心养育困难的情况下，官方媒体常常将人口发展与国家的强大和“复兴”联系起来。

High childcare costs and having to stop their careers have put many women off having more children or any at all. Gender discrimination and traditional stereotypes of women caring for the children are still widespread throughout the country.翻译:高昂的育儿费用和不得不停止自己的职业生涯，让许多女性不愿生更多的孩子，甚至根本不想生孩子。性别歧视和妇女照顾孩子的传统陈规定型观念在全国仍然普遍存在。

Authorities have in recent months increased rhetoric on sharing the duty of child rearing but paternity leave is still limited in most provinces.翻译:近几个月来，当局加大了关于分担抚养子女责任的言论，但大多数省份的陪产假仍然受到限制。

The country reported a drop of roughly 850,000 people for a population of 1.41175 billion in 2022, marking the first decline since 1961, the last year of China's Great Famine.翻译:该国报告称，2022年，中国总人口为14.1175亿，减少约85万人，这是自1961年（中国大饥荒的最后一年）以来的首次下降。

Reporting by Farah Master; Editing by Michael Perry翻译:法拉大师报道；迈克尔·佩里编辑

item.title: 微型股在中国低迷的股市中大放异彩
item.description:
China's annus horribilis has seen its stock markets fall, funds run up losses and foreign investors run for the exit. But areas of the market dominated by small stocks and frequented by the country's retail investors have done surprisingly well.翻译:中国的灾难之年见证了股市下跌、基金亏损增加、外国投资者纷纷撤离。但以小型股票为主且该国散户投资者经常光顾的市场领域却表现出奇的好。

Scores of retail investors are dabbling in micro-cap stocks - stocks whose market capitalisation is tiny - operating under the radar of big funds and investors and their massive market-moving flows.翻译:许多散户投资者正在涉足微型股（市值很小的股票），这些股票在大型基金和投资者及其巨大的市场波动资金的关注下运作。

Take self-employed retail trader Joseph Cui, for instance. By buying micro-cap stocks of artificial intelligence(AI) companies, Cui has picked a corner of the market big fund managers can barely squeeze into, and made a fat 20% return on his 2-million-yuan ($273,347.27) investment.翻译:以个体零售商人 Joseph Cui 为例。通过购买人工智能（AI）公司的小盘股，崔天凯选择了大型基金经理难以挤入的市场一角，并在他的 200 万元（273,347.27 美元）投资中获得了 20% 的丰厚回报。

"It's a tough environment for big capital. But for short-term money, it's easy play," Cui said.翻译:“对于大资本来说，这是一个艰难的环境。但对于短期资金来说，这很容易，”崔说。

Strategies such as Cui's stand out this year in a stock market depressed by China's wobbly economy, heightened geopolitical risks and surging overseas interest rates.翻译:今年，在中国经济不稳定、地缘政治风险加剧和海外利率飙升导致股市低迷的情况下，崔天凯等策略脱颖而出。

The Wind Micro Market Cap Index, which tracks the 400 China-listed A-shares with market value typically less than 3 billion yuan each, is up 37% so far this year. In contrast, the blue-chip CSI300 Index (.CSI300) has lost 8%.翻译:Wind微市值指数追踪400只中国上市A股，每只市值通常低于30亿元人民币，今年迄今已上涨37%。相比之下，蓝筹股沪深300指数(.CSI300)下跌了8%。

While institution-dominated companies with large market values in sectors such as banking and manufacturing have faced selling pressure from investment funds in a struggling economy, micro stocks have become neat counter-cyclical targets.翻译:尽管银行和制造业等行业中市值较大的机构主导型公司在经济陷入困境时面临投资基金的抛售压力，但微型股票已成为绝佳的反周期目标。

Such stocks lend themselves to speculation, particularly when tied in some way to Chinese chip behemoth Huawei Technologies or hot concepts such as AI, making the retail rush somewhat similar to last year's meme-stock frenzy in the United States, albeit without short-sellers on the other side of the trades.翻译:此类股票容易引发投机，特别是当以某种方式与中国芯片巨头华为技术公司或人工智能等热门概念联系在一起时，使得散户热潮与去年美国的迷因股票狂潮有些相似，尽管没有卖空者交易的另一面。

Chinese regulators meanwhile seem cool with the micro-cap craze, even though it is worryingly reminiscent of the casino-like Chinese market culture of more than a decade ago.翻译:与此同时，中国监管机构似乎对微型股热潮表现得很冷静，尽管这令人担忧地让人想起十多年前赌场般的中国市场文化。

"Regulators appear to be greenlighting speculative activities so as to prop up the stock market," said Yuan Yuwei, fund manager at Water Wisdom Asset Management.翻译:“监管机构似乎为投机活动开绿灯，以支撑股市，”水智慧资产管理公司基金经理袁宇伟表示。

"The connivance is hurting the system of value investment, encouraging misbehaviours, and is negative to long-term health of the market."翻译:“这种纵容正在损害价值投资体系，鼓励不当行为，对市场的长期健康不利。”

The China Securities Regulatory Commission (CSRC) did not immediately respond to a request for comment.翻译:中国证监会（CSRC）没有立即回应置评请求。

CONCEPT STOCKS

Retail investor Helen Wu is not bashful talking about "stir-frying" - the practice of pumping up stocks with hot concepts.翻译:散户吴海伦毫不羞涩地谈论“炒作”——用热门概念炒作股票的做法。

"We mainly pick stocks with a big story to tell, such as AI or Huawei, so that stir-frying becomes easy," Wu said, referring to the mania in China around ChatGPT, as well as much-hyped technological breakthroughs at U.S.-blacklisted firm Huawei.翻译:“我们主要挑选有大故事的股票，比如人工智能或华为，这样炒起来就容易了，”吴说，他指的是中国对ChatGPT的狂热，以及美国大肆炒作的技术突破——华为被列入黑名单。

"We don't touch stocks with big institutional holdings, due to big selling pressure in a downbeat economy."翻译:“由于经济低迷，抛售压力巨大，我们不会接触机构大量持有的股票。”

Retail investors are a big force in China. CSRC Chairman Yi Huiman notes that their transactions accounted for about 60% of the total A-shares turnover in late 2022.翻译:散户投资者是中国的一股重要力量。证监会主席易会满指出，他们的交易额约占2022年底A股总成交额的60%。

An index tracking China's actively-managed equity funds (.CSI930890) has slumped 14% this year after sell-offs in once favoured sectors such as battery companies and spirit makers. In contrast, an index tracking ChatGPT concept stocks such as 360 Security Technology (601360.SS) and TRS Information Technology (300229.SZ) has soared more than 40%.翻译:在电池公司和烈酒制造商等曾经受青睐的行业遭到抛售后，追踪中国主动管理股票基金的指数(.CSI930890)今年已下跌14%。相比之下，追踪360安全科技（601360.SS） 、TRS信息科技（300229.SZ）等ChatGPT概念股的指数则飙升超过40%。

In a recent case, loss-making Ningbo Shenglong Automotive Powertrain System Co (603178.SS) jumped nearly 250% in three weeks on speculation that is a supplier for Huawei's planned electric vehicle, forcing the company to flag investment risks last week.翻译:在最近的一个案例中，亏损的宁波盛龙汽车动力系统股份有限公司（603178.SS）因猜测其是华为计划中的电动汽车的供应商而在三周内上涨了近250%，迫使该公司上周提示了投资风险。

Lu Deyong, a retail trader, said he made a 100% profit of 100,000 yuan betting on a Huawei concept stock, Seres Group (601127.SS), whose shares doubled in the past two months even while it booked a loss for the first three quarters of 2023.翻译:散户陆德勇表示，他押注华为概念股塞雷斯集团（601127.SS） 10万元，盈利100%，该股前三个月亏损，但近两个月翻了一倍。 2023 年季度。

"Market buys Seres for the imagination of its future, not its current fundamentals," Lu said.翻译:“市场购买 Seres 是为了对其未来的想象，而不是其当前的基本面，”卢说。

Some brokerages are starting to recommend micro stocks to clients.翻译:一些券商开始向客户推荐微型股票。

GF Securities said in an October strategy report that buying micro stocks is part of a new investment paradigm in a stock market suffering from anaemic growth, and global decoupling risks.翻译:广发证券在10月策略报告中表示，在面临增长乏力和全球脱钩风险的股市中，购买微型股是新投资范式的一部分。

"Speculation in concept stocks has been active throughout the year, and regulators have their eyes half-closed," said Huang Yan, general manager of Shanghai QiuYang Capital Co.翻译:上海秋阳资本有限公司总经理黄岩表示：“全年概念股炒作活跃，监管层却是半睁着眼睛。”

"A crackdown would dampen an already lifeless market."翻译:“打击行动将削弱本已毫无生气的市场。”

($1 = 7.3167 Chinese yuan renminbi)翻译:（1 美元 = 7.3167 人民币）

Reporting by Jason Xue, Samuel Shen in Shanghai, Summer Zhen in Hong Kong Editing by Vidya Ranganathan and Simon Cameron-Moore翻译:Jason Xu、Samuel Shen 在上海报道，Summer Jen 在香港报道 Vidya Ranganathan 和 Simon Cameron-Moore 编辑
